name: PHASECardioidDirectivityModelParameters
desc: An object that directs sound in a heart-shaped curve surrounding a sound source.

items.name: init(subbandParameters: [PHASECardioidDirectivityModelSubbandParameters])
items.desc: Creates an object that directs sound in a heart-shaped curve surrounding a sound source.

items.name: var subbandParameters: [PHASECardioidDirectivityModelSubbandParameters]
items.desc: An array of frequencies that describe varying sound emission across the spectrum.
